overview: Adam was a high school kid who thought he was cool and had the answers. He had his friends, a girlfriend, but no time for the Lord. Then one day, Adam died. Guess where he went? Is hell real? Ask Adam. He knows. This drama is targeted toward a rebellious teen and those who don't think they need the Lord in their life.
tagline: ...where their WORM dieth not and their fire is not quenched...
title: Worm
